author: hwright
msg: Merge r26115 from trunk, enabling svndiff1 deltas for ra_svn's

author: hwright
msg: * STATUS: Add a vote for r26115, approving.

author: cmpilato
msg: Having lost far too much time today chasing down bogus uses of the RA
API (and recalling that sussman recently suffered similarly), put some
assertions in place to save others this fate in the future.
svn_ra_get_locks): Assert that input paths obey the API.

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix some illegal uses of the RA layer (sending absolute paths through
where session-relative ones are expected) that just happened to work
out okay by sheer dumb luck.
'path' as something intended to be relative to the RA session URL.
the session-relative URL and update call to get_implied_mergeinfo().
While here, tweak some logic for better readability.  Callers updated.
local variables instead of the pair's src_rel and dst_rel members.

author: cmpilato
msg: Document an inconsistency in the RA API.  (Hopefully a precursor to
actually repairing it, but there are only so many hours in the day...)
(svn_ra_get_mergeinfo): Fix docstring to adhere to our doxygen
conventions, but (more importantly) to note that this function's set of
input paths are full filesystem paths.
